Package Pacman

Class Drawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • Pacman.Drawable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Case, Entity
    public abstract class Drawable
extends java.lang.Object
    The drawable class is an abstract class which represents all the drawable object on the game using images to display them
    Author:
    Nicolas FONNIER, Henri GLEVEAU
